title.rendered: 2016 Brand Nieuwe Conference: Estimating & Price Lock

content.rendered:
A couple of updates and an important request on the Brand Nieuwe Conference today:

1) We will be keeping the early-bird price of €500 through the rest of registration. We will not be raising the ticket price to €600 as originally planned. At-the-door tickets, after online registration closes on June 13, will go up to €600.

2) If you are planning on attending, the hotel room blocks are limited and will be gone fast, so if you are looking to take advantage of that, better to do it soon.

3) Lastly, if you are planning on attending but haven’t yet purchased your ticket, PLEASE let us know in the form below. Since this is our first time doing the conference in Europe we don’t know if people buy at the last minute or not and since we have to start ordering materials and swag we need to know if we are ordering for 500 people or 1,000 people. Your help will be most appreciated.
